mapper.select: select scr_typ_key::TEXT as cd, re_pred_typ_nm as cd_nm from lrndmt.mt_dm_scr_typ where scr_typ_key > 0

select f1.scr_typ_key::TEXT as prediction_type , count(f1.stud_key) as prediction_cnt from lrndmt.mt_ft_stud_hst_dly f1 where f1.dt_key = #{dt}::INTEGER and f1.tchr_key = #{tchrId}::INTEGER group by f1.scr_typ_key

select f1.stud_key as stud_id , d1.scr_typ_key::TEXT as prediction_type from lrndmt.mt_ft_stud_hst_dly f1 inner join lrndmt.mt_dm_scr_typ d1 on f1.scr_typ_key = d1.scr_typ_key where f1.dt_key = #{dt}::INTEGER and f1.tchr_key = #{tchrId}::INTEGER order by f1.scr_typ_key, f1.stud_key
